p: Sera were tested by the virus microneutralisation assay (MN), described for phleboviruses [ 19] in parallel for 3 distinct sandfly-borne phleboviruses: (i) TOSV strain MRS2010-4319501 (TOSV belongs to the Sandfly fever Naples virus species or complex) [ 22], (ii) SFSV strain Sabin [ 23], (iii) Arbia-like virus strain T131 ( Salehabad species or complex), and (iv) Adana virus strain 195 ( Salehabad species or complex) [ 15].
